Package ca.phon.app.session.editor.undo

Class SessionEditorUndoableEdit

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
ca.phon.app.session.editor.undo.SessionEditorUndoableEdit
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.undo.UndoableEdit
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddGroupEdit, AddParticipantEdit, AddRecordEdit, AddTierEdit, ChangeSpeakerEdit, DeleteRecordEdit, MediaLocationEdit, MergeAllGroupsEdit, MergeGroupEdit, ParticipantUndoableEdit, RecordExcludeEdit, RecordMoveEdit, RemoveGroupEdit, RemoveParticipantEdit, RemoveTierEdit, ScTypeEdit, SessionDateEdit, SessionLanguageEdit, SplitGroupEdit, SyllabifyEdit, TierEdit, TierNameEdit, TierViewEdit, TierViewItemEdit, ToggleDiphthongEdit
public abstract class SessionEditorUndoableEdit
extends javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
implements IExtendable
Base class for SessionEditor changes. All changes to the Session should go through the UndoManager.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getSource

      public java.lang.Object getSource()
      Get the source for the edit. This value is given to the resulting EditorEvents. During undo/redo operations, the source is always the value of getEditor().getUndoSupport().
      Returns:
      the source

    • setSource

      public void setSource​(java.lang.Object source)
      Set the source for the edit. This is the source passed to the initial execution of the edit. Undo/redo operations always use the editor's undo support as the source.
      Parameters:
      the - edit source
